alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 11:29PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Owyhee County through 1215 AM MDT... At 1129 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Juniper Basin Reservoir, or 14 miles northwest of Owyhee, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mountain View Lake around 1140 PM MDT. Miller Creek Settlement around 1150 PM MDT. Riddle and Otter Reservoir around 1200 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
